title: Google\Cloud\TextToSpeech\V1\SynthesisInput
name: SynthesisInput
description:
Contains text input to be synthesized. Either text or ssml must be supplied. Supplying both or neither returns [google.rpc.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT][]. The input size is limited to 5000 characters.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.texttospeech.v1.SynthesisInput

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.ssml
params.description: The SSML document to be synthesized. The SSML document must be valid and well-formed. Otherwise the RPC will fail and return [google.rpc.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT][]. For more information, see SSML.

methods.name: getText
methods.description:
The raw text to be synthesized.

Generated from protobuf field string text = 1;

methods.name: setText
methods.description:
The raw text to be synthesized.

Generated from protobuf field string text = 1;

methods.name: getSsml
methods.description:

Generated from protobuf field string ssml = 2;
